title: "U.S. soybean, corn yields could be increased through use of machine learning"
excerpt: "Research guided by a plant pathologist in Penn State's College of Agricultural Sciences suggests that machine-learning algorithms that are programmed to recognize changing weather patterns could show producers and agricultural managers how to increase soybean and corn yields in the United States."
